summary: Implements the Whisper tokenizer, handling special tokens (bos, eos, language, task, timestamp control), optional prefix spaces, and providing encoding/decoding utilities for speech recognition and translation. It supports multilingual fine‑tuning by prepending language and task identifiers and can include or omit timestamp tokens.
business_intent: Facilitate tokenization for Whisper models in speech‑to‑text and speech‑translation pipelines, enabling accurate preprocessing of audio transcripts, multilingual support, and timestamp management for downstream ASR/translation tasks.
